column4: I have another question: On my machine, whenever it beeps it gives me a visual beep instead of an audible one, any ideas on how to make it audible?
None, it's ubuntu server, pure command line
set bell-style  audible (could be also 'visible' or 'none')
I am sorry, but how do you do that?
i did that and pressed ^G and it still gives me a visual beep
are you accessing it with ssh and  terminal emulator ?
Oh yea, I forgot about that.
as long as the first line (shebang) is correct, it will work with any file
how did you install to the drive?
First, I erased it with Disk Utility on the Mac. The installed to it using the whole disk and installed the bootloader on the USB.
But that's the thing, I am not trying to install FROM a USB drive, I am trying to install TO it and boot from the USB on a Mac
Wait, nvm, just read the last part :P
